org.jpc.util

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpc.util.ResourceManager

  • public class ResourceManager
extends Object
    A utility class for copying all the logic resources in a given url to a tmp location. Provides methods for obtaining the path in the file system of any given resource, given the original url of the resource.
    Author:
    sergioc

      • hasBeenProcessed

        public boolean hasBeenProcessed(URL url)
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        true if the url has already been processed (i.e., tmp files for all logic files have been copied in a tmp location). false otherwise

      • process

        public boolean process(URL url)
        Find all the logic files in the given url and copy them in a tmp folder
        Parameters:
        url -
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the url has been processed after this call if the URL was already processed before returns false If it is not possible to process the URL an exception will be launched
